comments.author: Karthik K
comments.body:
Thanks Uwe. 

Added another patch to LUCENE-1257 to get away from some of the casting that is not necessary given that LUCENE-1984 and LUCENE-1985 are in now ( with generics ).

description: For better readability  - converting the Iterable<T> to  for ( A  a : container ) constructs that is more intuitive to read.
summary: DisjunctionMaxQuery -  Iterator code to  for ( A  a : container ) construct
